title: God's Own Country
description: Kerala: The Paradise of India – Explore lush backwaters, golden beaches, and vibrant culture!

title: The Nilgiris
description: Nilgiris: The Blue Mountains – Discover serene landscapes, lush tea gardens, and cool, misty heights!

title: The Golden Triangle
description: Delhi, Agra, Jaipur: Experience the essence of India's rich history and vibrant culture!

title: Rajasthan Royalty
description: Rajasthan: Embrace the regal charm of magnificent palaces, historic forts, and desert landscapes!

title: Goa Getaway
description: Goa: Relax on sun-kissed beaches, enjoy vibrant nightlife, and savor delicious seafood!

title: Himalayan Retreat
description: Himalayas: Discover breathtaking mountain vistas, serene monasteries, and invigorating treks!
